      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_4df632684e485e055cd5fc9aedc382cc856fbc96</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The colour of daffodils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Farbe der Narzissen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La couleur des jonquilles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cor dos daffodils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il colore dei daffodils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χρώμα των daffodils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El color de narcisos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why daffodils are yellow in colour.  Daffodils reflect only yellow and absorb all the other colours in the spectrum.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">daffodils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yellow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum Narzissen in der 
Farbe gelb sind. Narzissen reflektieren nur Gelb und saugen alle
anderen Farben im Spektrum auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi les jonquilles
sont jaunes en couleurs. Les jonquilles reflètent seulement le 
jaune et absorbent toutes les autres couleurs dans le spectre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque os daffodils são
amarelos na cor. Os daffodils refletem somente o amarelo e 
absorvem todas as cores restantes no spectrum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè i daffodils 
sono gialli a colori. I daffodils riflettono soltanto il colore 
giallo ed assorbono tutti i altri colori nello spettro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί daffodils είναι 
κίτρινος στο χρώμα. Το Daffodils απεικονίζει μόνο 
κίτρινο και απορροφά όλα τα άλλα χρώματα στο φάσμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué los narcisos 
son amarillos en color. Los narcisos reflejan solamente amarillo
y absorben el resto de colores en el espectro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Narzissen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
